attributes.action: All Mps and diplomats to have the vaccine or be fired..
attributes.additional_details: If you do make mandatory vaccinations for us then it should be the same for yourself to all MPs and diplomat's should take the vaccine there is no excuse
attributes.background: If it's not mandatory for you then it should not be mandatory for us

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

All MP's & staff to have Covid19 Vaccine to attend & work at Parliament by law: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593408

Make covid-19 vaccination a requirement for all elected representatives: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598503

The UK Government could make Covid-19 vaccination a condition of service for UK diplomats, but vaccination requirements for diplomats of other countries would be a matter for their employer, not the Government or House of Commons.
